splash-screen-disclaimer.en: Works best under recent versions of Google Chrome.

play_button.en:
Press here to start and stop playback.

Alternatively, on desktop, you can just press SPACE!

title_regenerate.en: Click on the title here to sample a brand new starting proposition, useful if you're feeling stuck at some point!

note_box.en:
Touch the blue boxes to trigger a regeneration of the underlying portion of the score.
You can also scroll on these boxes to vary the granularity.
note_box.de: Tippen Sie auf die blauen Kästen des Notenblattes, um die darunter liegenden Teile der Partitur neu generieren zu lassen.

granularity.en: Touch the blue boxes to trigger a regeneration of the underlying portion of the score.
granularity.de: Tippen Sie auf die blauen Kästen des Notenblattes, um die darunter liegenden Teile der Partitur neu generieren zu lassen.

fermata_box.de: Tippen Sie auf die gestrichelten Kästchen, um eine Fermata zu setzen. Damit kann die Struktur des Chorales kontrolliert werden.
fermata_box.en: Touch the dotted boxes to position an intermediate fermata. On your following regeneration operations, these will guide the model by requesting it to add an intermediate conclusion here, allowing you to structure your generations.

spectrogram_general.en: This spectrogram image represents the sound currently generated by NOTONO in a time-frequency fashion.

spectrogram_interaction.en:
Click on the cells of this grid to regenerate the underlying zone in the spectrogram.

You can activate multiple cells at once by clicking and dragging on the grid.

drag-n-drop.en:
...oh, and you can also drag and drop an audio file from your computer anywhere onto the app to import it and transform it thereafter!

Imported sounds will automatically be cropped to 1min.

constraints.en:
These icons define the constraints used when performing regeneration operations.

Set the values then select a region of the spectrogram to regenerate it with the chosen options.

download.en: Click here at any point to store the current sound locally on your machine as an audio file!

fade-in.en:
Declick adds a slight fade-in to the audio playback. This can reduce fatigue for your ears during long sessions with sounds containing strong attacks.
Gain allows to control the playback volume of the sound.

Note that the fade-in is not applied when storing sounds via the download button, letting you control any processing in your DAW.
